Bases: object

Variable initialiser.

assign(name, values)[source]¶

Assign values to a particular variable.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of variables.

  • values (list[tensor]) – List of values to assign.

Generate initialisers.

Parameters

Returns

varz.util.match(pattern, target)[source]¶

Match a string exactly against a pattern, where the pattern is a regex with ‘*’ as the only active character.

Parameters

  • pattern (str) – Pattern.

  • target (str) – Target.

bool: True if pattern matches target.
